creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: pack of dogs at R chases down a large hare while two men with guns actively observe; a fence and trees near center separates L and R scene; at L, pack of dogs chases down stag, while hunter with gun at LLC watches; scattered trees and shrubbery
marks:
Signature, Mark, Label

in graphite on verso: [B monogram in plate, bottom left: [VS]
provenance: Antoine Vivenel (1799-1862), sale in 1862; [Christopher Mendez, London; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Stag and Hare Hunt
